author: cnbc.com
title: Jones Energy, Inc. Schedules 2017 Fourth Quarter and Full Year Earnings Release and Conference Call
text:
AUSTIN, Texas, Feb. 23, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Jones Energy, Inc. (NYSE:JONE) (“Jones Energy” or “the Company”) announced today that it plans to release its fourth quarter and full year 2017 financial and operational results on Tuesday, February 27, 2018 after the market closes. In connection with the earnings release, Jones Energy will host a conference call for investors and analysts to discuss its results on Wednesday, February 28, 2018 at 10:30 a.m. ET (9:30 a.m. CT). The conference call can be accessed via webcast through the Investor Relations section of Jones Energy’s website, www.jonesenergy.com , or by dialing (833) 231-8272 (domestic U.S.) or (647) 689-4117 (International) and entering the conference code 9178268.
If you are not able to participate in the conference call, the webcast replay and a downloadable audio file will be available shortly following the call through the Investor Relations section of the Company’s website, www.jonesenergy.com .
About Jones Energy
Jones Energy, Inc. is an independent oil and natural gas company engaged in the development and acquisition of oil and natural gas properties in the Anadarko basin of Oklahoma and Texas. Additional information about Jones Energy may be found on the Company’s website at: www.jonesenergy.com .
